name.ja: <ruby>生<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>書<rt>しょ</rt></ruby>－<ruby>禁<rt>きん</rt></ruby><ruby>断<rt>だん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>呪<rt>じゅ</rt></ruby><ruby>術<rt>じゅつ</rt></ruby>－

requirement.en: Your opponent has a monster in their Graveyard during a turn you have not activated "Book of Life".

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Zombie Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, place 1 monster from your opponent's Graveyard on the bottom of the Deck.
